snippet.title: Mad King - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description: Take a look at gameplay, characters, how to play, and game modes like PvP, 2v2, and 5-player in this trailer for Mad King, an upcoming strategy card game featuring unique battle mechanics. In Mad King, choose your hero, play what you're dealt with, and outsmart your opponent.

localized.title: Mad King - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
localized.description: Take a look at gameplay, characters, how to play, and game modes like PvP, 2v2, and 5-player in this trailer for Mad King, an upcoming strategy card game featuring unique battle mechanics. In Mad King, choose your hero, play what you're dealt with, and outsmart your opponent.
